function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High infection rates in adult populations with acute respiratory illness","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing strict infection control measures and public health interventions","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, contact tracing technology, and vaccination programs","People":"Healthy young adults, healthy elderly adults, high-risk adults with underlying cardiopulmonary disease, hospitalized group","Owner":"Public health agencies, healthcare institutions, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Variability in prevalence and case fatality rates across different populations","Impact":"Increased risk of severe illness and mortality in certain demographic groups","Mitigation":"Tailoring healthcare interventions to high-risk populations and improving access to healthcare for vulnerable groups","Technologies":"Precision medicine, telemedicine, and targeted healthcare outreach programs","People":"Elderly adults, high-risk adults with underlying cardiopulmonary disease","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Comparison to the 1918 influenza pandemic","Impact":"Potential for a similar scale of impact on public health and mortality","Mitigation":"Improving early detection and response capabilities, enhancing public health infrastructure, and increasing vaccine readiness","Technologies":"Early warning systems, pandemic preparedness tools, and predictive modeling","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health agencies, government authorities, and scientific community"}]}
